name: meteorite
effect: RSE: May be traded to Professor Cozmo for tm27. FRLG: A meteorite to be delivered to Lostelle’s father.
short_effect: FL: Deliver to Lostelle’s father. RSE: Trade to Professor Cozmo for TM27 (Return).

flavor_text.sun_moon: A Meteorite originally found at Meteor Falls. You got it at Mt. Chimney.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A Meteorite originally found at Meteor Falls. You got it at Mt. Chimney.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A Meteorite originally found at Meteor Falls. You got it at Mt. Chimney.
